short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lordy, that's a lot of sticks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lordy, wouldn't it be better if there was just a hint of fun when reading the news of the day?  "Robert S. Mueller III" is dry and boring. "Bobby Three Sticks" is fun!  So this extension will make the change for you.
